title: James Gillanders gave a talk on Spectroscopic Modelling of the kilonova AT2017gfo at Irish National Astronomy Meeting in September ’21 in which he demonstrated how he used TARDIS.
short_description: James Gillanders gave a talk on Spectroscopic Modelling of the kilonova AT2017gfo at *Irish National Astronomy Meeting* in September ’21 in which he demonstrated how he used TARDIS.
